entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure `EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateObjectIndexingByNonIntConst` #90354
    8.0.0
  • Built-in `JsonNamingPolicy` types don't recognize surrogate pairs #90352
    Future
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` #90351
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure`DebuggerTests.ArrayTests.InspectInlineArray2` #90345
  • Assert failure on Debug build #90341
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) -System.IO.IOException #90338
  • Trim analysis hole for possible assignment to array #90335
  • NativeAOT is crashing on static interface method #90333
  • InvalidOperationException due to use of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BinaryOperatorKind.Error enum #90331
    8.0.0
  • Optimize constant AVX512/AVX2 vectors with broadcast #90328
    Future
  • Constant folding for `long->float` produces an incorrect result. #90323
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: the keyed service registration serviceKey non-nullable #90322
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in GetHttp11ConnectionAsync #90317
  • ArgumentException: maccatalyst does not have a valid platform name #90313
  • CMake error on ios+NativeAOT running smoke tests #90312
  • PlatformNotSupportedException thrown for System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.NodeFor #90311
    8.0.0
  • Tracking issue for "WORKLOAD TIMED OUT" #90309
  • [mono] Function pointer type equality and type compatibility are not properly handled #90308
    9.0.0
  • LibraryImport cannot handle a property named "System" #90299
    8.0.0
  • condition `var->opcode == OP_REGOFFSET` not met on s390x musl-libc #90292

Closed

  • Need better error message when it fails to create a Mutex due to no-write permission to the '/tmp' folder on macOS or Linux #36823
    9.0.0
  • Async File IO has regressed on Windows #67965
  • runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect failed with System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (55): No buffer space available #78541
    8.0.0
  • Windows cannot open the folder #89871
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38180: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #90170
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38178: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #90169
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-26423 | .NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability #57175
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-34485 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #57174
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-31204 | .NET Core Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #52608
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-26701 | .NET Core Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #49377
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-1721 | .NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability #48067
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-24112 | .NET 5 and .NET Core Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #48066
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2020-1147 | .NET Core Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #39296
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2020-1108 | .NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability #36313
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 7/26/2023 12:02:55 AM #89796
    8.0.0
  • rc1: Performance regressions in CastingPerf benchmarks #75537
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] Enable new IL trim feature for WASM apps #88696
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.AttRegexTests test fails in CI #75808
    8.0.0
  • Assert "Expression: result >= val" #79977
    8.0.0
  • CI System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests failure #84323
    8.0.0
  • Function pointer invocation performance #90305
    8.0.0
  • Should we consider sealed the newly introduced attributes for keyed service #90321
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn on PreserveSig methods that return a struct named HResult #89603
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Virtualize Component Memory Leak when Scrolling #88850
  • [mono][iOS] AOT fails for CommunityToolkit.WinUI.UI.dll #90032
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT Diagnostics in .NET 8 #79241
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT in .NET 8 #69739
    8.0.0
  • Trimming Tools in .NET 8 #78671
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Mach-O shared library has a hard-coded identification name under LC_ID_DYLIB #84500
    8.0.0
  • IsolatedStorage tests failing on CI on maccatalyst #87485
    9.0.0
  • TimeSeparator is still incorrect for "da-DK" locale #90300
  • Cannot Release To An Android Device On USB On New Install On Windows 11 #90307
  • MethodInvoker synthesizes arguments not provided? #90039
    8.0.0
  • Https_MultipleRequests_TlsResumed test is unreliable #88979
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'fgDidEarlyLiveness' #90295
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] Assertion failed 'lastAllocatedRefPosition->registerAssignment != RBM_NONE' in 'System.SpanHelpers:NonPackedIndexOfValueType[short,System.SpanHelpers+DontNegate`1[short]](byref,short,int):int' during 'LSRA build intervals' #88937
    8.0.0
  • Adjust error handling for new HttpClient metrics #90182
    8.0.0
  • Merged tests progress message looks broken #90277
    8.0.0
  • ios binding project with xcframework fails to link #89633
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #88307
    8.0.0
  • Assert running System.Net.Sockets tests on macOS 13 #77416
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 preview 7's illink runs with preview 6 if preview 6 is installed #90015

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED #90355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DiagnosticDescriptorHelper to set HelpURI for generator / analyzer diagnostics #90353
    area-Meta
  • Implement Edit and Continue on Linux and MacOS #90349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Symbolicate function names on debug callstack #90348
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable some tests on Firefox #90347
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Mark AddBinaryFormattedResource obsolete #90346
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90342
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Prefix type names with global and use static TypeSyntax and NameSyntax instead of Parse(Type)Name #90339
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/7.0-staging] Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations (#90285) #90337
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading
  • [DependencyInjection] Use '==' instead of 'Equals()` to test service type equality #90334
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][debugger] Add support for MONO_DEBUG_VAR_ADDRESS_MODE_VTADDR in set_var #90330
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Fix iOS nativeaot runtime test build #90327
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Ensure that constant folding for long->float is handled correctly #90325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90320
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework SnakeCase/KebabCase naming policies to closer match Json.NET's #90316
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use TCP transport for EventPipe on mobile platforms #90315
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Open up `EmbeddedXmlInfo` #90314
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add check for tizen in ilc and crossgen2 #90310
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prevent generic context runaway during inlining of polymorphic recursive methods #90306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable floats in Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits on arm64 and amd64 #90304
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Test calling `Problem()` test. #90296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Do not use `select(2)` on debugger-agent #90293
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90287
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • only slice SocketAddress on success operation #90284
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [mono][tasks] Generate uncompressed mibc files #90336
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: don't dead store OSR exposed locals #89867
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • List unsupported architectures in area-owners #90128
    area-Meta
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix COM object leak #89795
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.11
  • Support new Options attributes in the Runtime #90275
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Explicitly set SizeConst = 1 and remove the warning suppression #90174
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix NoLinkedOuput having the wrong base attribute type. #90256
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Report a diagnostic for return types with HResult-like named structures and provide a code-fix to do the correct marshalling #90282
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Improve codegen in impStringEqualsOrStartsWith #90288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Update runtimeFlavor property for Mono AOT perf jobs #90215
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Disable CodeQL on runtime-official.yml #90329
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assertion when a method doesn't set its return va… #90294
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Use the OP_MEMMOVE opcode instead of calling the managed… #90097
    needs-area-label
  • Remove unsafe code and make scheme parsing faster in Uri #90087
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Flow the IMeterFactory to SocketsHttpHandler on Mobile #90298
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Restore Crossgen2's Optimizations in CoreCLR Builds #90278
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add implementation and test for CallerAllocatedBufferType parameters #90263
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable isolates storage tests on maccatalyst #90150
    area-System.IO, os-maccatalyst
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #90285
    area-System.Threading
  • Mark Microsoft.NetCore.Platforms as non-shipping #90297
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `la.local` between the JIT_PatchedCodeStart #90143
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser] make cachedResourcesPurgeDelay configurable #90264
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #90119
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • make Https_MultipleRequests_TlsResumed test Linux specific #90286
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove an overeager assert in forward sub #90302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove EnableNativeEventPipe property #90274
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix intrinsics test failure log messages #90267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Lsra JitStressRegs mode SpillAlways fixes #89720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsics on amd64 #89997
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Report exception type name in Http metrics #90221
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix "Passed test" output #90279
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove --flat from default dsymutil options #89358
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address some code nits #90289
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Disable failing CI tests #90181
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Debugger IPC creation failure should not abort coreclr startup #90161
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [libs][Android] Reenable Trace_ClearTraceListeners_StopsWritingToDebugger test #90242
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Use current runtime version in ILLink.Tasks package #90197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Add Macatalyst support for library mode #90237
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2241178 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make getStaticFieldContent less conservative for struct with gc fields #90162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support calling `get_Item` passing decimal, float or double as parameter. #90260
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Evaluate a sum between an object and a string #90175
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add metrics configuration APIs #90201
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix up conditions to trigger relink, and require `wasm-tools` workload #89754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    area-System.Security
  • Use generated version files when printing/tracing host version info #90273
    area-Single-File
  • Switch DateTimeKind from Unspecified to Local #90149
    area-System.Management, community-contribution
  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Align V512 reads in IndexOf. #90177
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Add a workaround for android apps, in order to leverage the feature of trimming compiled methods #90106
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [QUIC] Merge 7.0 fix #90228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not generate internal archives #90050
    area-Setup
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add telemetry for mobile and wasm workloads #90208
    area-Build-mono
  • Improvements to Banned APIs #90165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • What is the expected behavior when a reference is missing? #90261
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90200
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] bind JS methods to minified WASM imports #90145
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fixed Enumerator variable null check #89920
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enabled tests failing previously on fullaot #90280
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [QUIC] WIP `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Reenable properties disabled in illink.targets #90231
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Disallow readonly instance fields in InlineArray structs #90262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix Shuffling Thunks part 1 #90266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix for #89645, stack overflow in Crossgen2 #90229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: use corresponding default message for all overloads #89846
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimization - DotNet6 Self Contained Trimmed Publish build still contains many files- and looks not required #34569
  • Git commit id in Assembly ProductionVersion field #34568

Closed

  • dotnet pack arguments Extensions #34559
  • GenAPI cannot decode records when reading from metadata #32196
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support Records in GenAPI #34433
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34529
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Don't fire NETSDK1206 if known RID platforms were not determined #34021
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Permit IEnumerable<T> as the type of a params parameter" #179
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: add overload resolution rule #7447

Updated

  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend ReadOnlySpan optimization to all constant data #69472
  • Support XAML LSP in vscode #69471
  • Ship Roslyn devkit assembly as a downloadable component #69467
  • LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync is flaky #69465
  • CS1591: Fix all occurrences fails with `InvalidOperationException` #69462
  • EnableGenerateDocumentationFile doesn't have any CAxxxx or IDExxxx #69457

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException in CSharpInitializeMemberFromPrimaryConstructorParameterCodeRefactoringProvider #69459
  • dotnet build fails if consumer namespace prefix is same as referenced class with usings within namespace #69439
    17.8
  • [BUG] When upgrading to dev kit the source generators no longer work. #68590
    GA
  • Reduce boxing allocations of `ExtensionMethodInfo` in IDE side #69165
    17.8 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.Create(1, 2, 3)` to `[1, 2, 3]` #69473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #69469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix lack of constructor exit warnings in copy constructors #69468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69466
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Consolidate rude edit reporting #69463
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Don't treat user-defined casts as constants in analyzers for "use pattern matching" and "convert if to switch" #69458
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Share more code in the 'use collection expression' fixers #69452
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CodeStylePage EditorConfigOptionsGenerator service #69425
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'initialize member from parameter' in linked files #69464
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Do not offer to convert spans to collection-expressions in .net7 and earlier. #69449
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Place a trailing comma at the end of multi-line collection exprs #69461
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve indentation of leading trivia when converting code to move to collection expressions. #69456
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add test demonstrating how trivia is handled #69448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid boxing when structs are used as collection keys. #69443
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix resolving import completion item in LSP #69454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • A better descriptor Id for an F# analyzer #69313
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warnings for collection initializers #69307
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Improve de-duping of project load failure toasts #69455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use new version of protocol to correctly serialize URIs #69453
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Soft-select "preselect" items if there's no filter text #69351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip AddImport calculation for source generated doc #69451
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Use argument validation consistently in all SourceText implementations #69391
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Document and test `ref readonly` breaking change #69437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow enhanced navigation when an interactive router is present #50014
  • New Identity login endpoint does not honor 'X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest' header #50010
  • MapIdentityApi HTTP endpoints #50009
  • Perf regression: Endpoint routing #50008
  • Closed issue even though it is not resolved? #49997
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_Query \ get_HasFormContentType #49991
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware does not log RequestBody when body is consumed by copying to another stream #49989
  • .NET web api stops responding, resulting in 503 errors (IIS) #49992
  • QueryHelpers.ParseQuery returns inconsistent value behavior. #49988
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts #49986
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #49985
  • Perf regression: mvc #49984
  • Allow using the `DefaultProblemDetailsFactory` without adding MVC Core #49982
  • Array of control references is not maintained on page renders after the first #49980
  • SignalR Stateful Reconnect API #49977

Closed

  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49999
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction, mvc #50000
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #50001
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50002
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50003
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes, mapaction #50004
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50005
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #50006
  • Component rendering/positioning problem in the new blazor web application template #49387
    8.0-rc1
  • Render issue when mixing render modes in server-rendered page #49490
    8.0-rc1
  • Enhanced navigation is not triggered by links in interactive components #49614
    8.0-rc1
  • Add test scenarios for nullable return types in route handlers for RDG #47237
    8.0-rc2
  • Create docs transport package before RC2 #49847
    8.0-rc2
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo doesn't navigate in Blazor Web App #49142
    8.0-rc1
  • No default interactivity without @rendermode specified in .NET 8 Preview 7 #49987
  • StateHasChanged starts a javascript before it is finished. #49994
  • Trimming warning is misleading #49363
  • Rehydrate invalid form data on Blazor SSR. #49939
  • .NET 5 Razor build error with templated (generic) component with abstract generic base class. #27218
    Backlog
  • Blazor Web App template includes icon-192.png file that doesn't appear to be used #49129
    8.0-rc1
  • Surface option in the Blazor Web App template for WebAssembly interactivity #48912
    8.0-rc1
  • [RequestSizeLimit(100_000_000)] not working. #49946
  • Embedding views no longer works with preview 6 #49705
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49963

PullRequests

Created

  • Use pre-boxed values in diagnostics #50013
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Allow enhanced navigation when an interactive router is present #50012
    area-blazor
  • Extend `PersistKeysToDbContext` (#49329) #50011
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Fix a typo in EndpointRoutingApplicationBuilderExtensions #49995
    area-runtime
  • Add tests and fix exception handling in form binding #49983
    area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • Combine email and username in MapIdentityApi #49981
    area-identity
  • Watch file-based certificates for changes #49979
    area-runtime
  • Add buffer limit option for SignalR Stateful Reconnect #49978
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Avoid Redis pattern matching #49938
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Support NativeAOT in PropertySetter #49897
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Create transport package for API docs #49969
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove redundant semicolon #49996
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-problem-details, 8.0-rc1
  • Add tests for null response scenarios to RDG #49970
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc1
  • Enable navigation when RenderModeServer #49768
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Tweak AddRazorPages trimming warning. #49377
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Quarantine CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #49976
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove code handling cases where NSI API isn't supported #49944
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2240878 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Synchronize KestrelTrace next-id comments #49964
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Null Argument Exception for at Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellToolbarTracker.OnToolbarPropertyChanged(Object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e) #16686
  • Referencing a Maui Library in a Maui App causes Apt2144 on Android build. on 7.0.400 SDK #16680
  • CORS policy: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' - triggering application crash #16677
  • [UITests] Add features for running tests in better isolation and for handling Multiple Test Cases #16675
    Backlog
  • Improve feedback from UI Tests when failing to navigate to next test #16674
    Backlog
  • Error NETSDK1032: The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'osx-arm64' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible. #16673
  • Problem doing a data binding in GraphicView #16671
  • Random empty rows on ListView #16669
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Border clips on the bottom and right #16667
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.92] DatePicker Initial Binding/Rendering Not Working #16664
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui MenuFlyOut Crashes #16663
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove maximize button finished with close button on the right instead of false #16662
  • CS1061 error in VS for Mac when referencing XAML views in code-behind #16659
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout and Columns Grid #16658
  • Empty MAUI project does not compile: dotnet workload install and restore for android workload fail in microsoft.android.sdk.windows.msi.x64::33.0.80 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json #16657
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Placeholder text issues MacCatalyst & iOS #16656
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Unable to Locate .NET MAUI in VS #16590
  • [regession/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] MAUI Blazor Hybrid rerenders whole layout after each navigation #16661
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) -System.IO.IOException: #16679
  • Button properties are inconsistent when applying android themes #14404
    .NET 8 GA
  • After update, Visual Studio 2022 Preview from 17.7. Preview 6 to 17.8.0 Preview 1 OnClick stopped working - MAUI Blazor #16684
  • Publish replaces "net6.0" tag in Class library with "net6.0-windows10.0.19041" #16649

    .NET 8 GA
  • SwipeView does not work on Android #14805
    Under Consideration
  • Swipe not working when SwipeView is used as base element #6154
    Under Consideration
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Voiceover: Voice over is not announcing the "Review" label for slider, Minus, Plus buttons. #15595
    .NET 8 GA
  • Net 7 and net 8 preview 1 side by side I get Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #16626
  • new MAUI App project, Nuget dependencies are not being restored #16615
  • https://github.com/gorkhadk/maui_crash_reproduction #16630
  • The Tick event trigger continuously on Android #10257
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685

  • Use the correct WASDK property #16683
    area/single project ☝️, backport/suggested

    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [net7.0] Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16641
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix the case where silent was requested #16676
    area/Xaml </>
  • Update CODEOWNERS #16682
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What is the recommended way to set Isolation Level Globally #31442
  • Support for Relational Properties as Parameters in Stored Procedures #31441
  • Nullable owned object after reload entity #31440

Closed

  • TPH with Generic Entity referencing another TPH table causes endless migrations #31314
    8.0.0-rc1
  • SQLite: Translate more Math members #18843
    8.0.0-rc1
  • Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31100
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443

Merged

  • Migrations: Synthesize HasColumnName in snapshot when DefaultColumnName uses CLR type #31437
  • SQLite: Translate more Math members #31356
  • Fix to #31100 - Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31317
  • Metadata for primitive collection mapping #31351

Created
